Caste Certificate :

The following are the list of documents required for obtaining caste certificate in Maharashtra.


1)Application form 
2)Residence proof 
3)Copy of birth certificate 
4)Copy of ration card 
5)Copy of income certificate 
6)Copy of voter ID card / electoral roll 
7)Aadhaar Card 
8)Photograph 

To apply online(only for maharashtra) 
https://aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in/en/Login/Certificate_Documents?ServiceId=1284


To re-apply for lost Caste Certificate:


To get caste certificate in Maharashtra you have to visit
 Tahasildar office in your Taluk.Collect the application and submit it with the
 following documents.


Residence Proof (Ration Card /Rent / Maintenance Receipt / Landline Telephone Bill / Electricity Bill) 

School Leaving Certificate of Candidate. 

Caste Certificate of Parents i.e. Father/Grandfather/Aunty (Fatherâ€™s Sister)/Uncle (Blood Relation). 

You also need to provide an affidavit which states that you belong to particular Caste.


You will get with in 21 days of submitting the application.
